com.snakybo.torch.graphics.material

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.asset.Asset
      • com.snakybo.torch.graphics.material.Material

  • public final class Material
extends Asset

    Materials contain the properties of how a Mesh should be rendered.

    Since:
    1.0
